attributes.action: Stop the Americanization of the united Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England is an enchanting place with customs and values that should be treasured. Stop England from turning into little America!

rejection.details: What exactly do you want the Government to do?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
